page.title: 11WEST SLEEKBURN MIDDLE SCHOOL
page.content: Our school teaches girls and boys between the ages of 9 and 13.All of the pupils travel to school in Jordan's coaches as the houses in the area were demolished when the local pit closed some years ago. There are about 360 pupils at present but the numbers have fallen in recent years.We have twenty teachers including Mr Surtees our headmaster. Attached to the school is a partial hearing unit but this will be moving next year(September 1985). There are 15 classrooms including 4 mobiles as well as a dining room/gym. Our school is unusual because we have stables attached and pupils can go horse riding. In the quadrangle we have a 3x2 metre pond which was built by Mr. Ogilvie our science teacher in 1980. See W.Sleekburn M.School Staff
